# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-105">준수 센터의 DLP(데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 준비가 된 많은 중요한 정보 유형이 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-110">중요한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-113">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-114">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-115">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-116">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-117">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-118">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-119">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-120">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-121">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-122">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-123">변형되지 않은: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-124">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-125">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-126">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-127">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-128">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-129">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-130">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-130">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-131">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-131">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-137">abarouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-137">abarouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-138">abaroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-138">abaroutingnumber</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-141">bankrouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-141">bankrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-142">bankroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-142">bankroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-143">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-143">routing #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-144">라우팅 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-144">routing no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-145">라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-145">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-146">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-146">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-147">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-147">routing#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-148">RTN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-148">RTN</span></span>


## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-149">아르헨티나 국가 ID(DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-150">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-151">8자리 숫자(기간 유무)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-151">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-153">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-154">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-155">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-155">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-156">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-157">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-157">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-158">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-159">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-160">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-161">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-162">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-163">정규식은 Regex_argentina_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-164">검색된 Keyword_argentina_national_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-170">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-170">dni</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-176">호주 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-177">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-178">은행 주 분기 번호가 있는 경우 또는 없는 6-10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-178">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-179">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-180">계정 번호는 6-10자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-181">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-182">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-183">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-184">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-185">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-186">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-187">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-189">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-190">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-191">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-192">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-193">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-194">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-210">오스트레일리아 비즈니스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-210">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-211">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-212">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-213">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-214">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-215">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-216">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-217">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-218">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-219">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-220">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-221">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-222">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-223">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-224">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-225">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-226">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-227">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-228">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-229">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-232">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-233">검색된 Keywords_australian_business_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-234">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-235">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-245">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-245">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-246">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-246">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-247">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-247">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-248">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-248">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-251">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-252">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-253">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-254">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-255">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-256">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-257">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-257">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-258">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-258">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-259">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-260">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-261">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-262">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-265">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-266">검색된 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-267">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-268">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-278">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-279">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-280">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-281">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-282">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-283">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-284">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-285">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-286">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-287">선택적 문자 1-2개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-288">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-289">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-290">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-291">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-292">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-293">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-294">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-295">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-296">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-297">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-397">오스트레일리아 의료 계정 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-398">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-399">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-401">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-402">첫 번째 숫자가 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-403">9번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-404">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-405">11자리 숫자(선택 사항)는 개별 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-406">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-407">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-408">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-409">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-410">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-411">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-412">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-424">호주 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-425">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-426">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-428">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-429">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-430">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-431">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-432">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-433">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-434">검색된 Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-468">호주 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-469">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-470">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-471">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-472">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백이 있는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-473">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-474">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-475">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-476">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-477">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-478">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-479">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-480">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-481">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-482">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-483">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-484">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-496">오스트리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-497">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-498">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-498">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-499">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-500">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-500">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-501">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-502">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-502">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-503">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-504">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-505">`Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-505">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-506">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-506">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-633">오스트리아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-633">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-634">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-634">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-635">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-635">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-636">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-636">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-637">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-637">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-638">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-638">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-639">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-639">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-640">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-641">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-641">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-642">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-643">24자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-643">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-644">22개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-644">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-645">두 글자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-645">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-646">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-647">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-647">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-648">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-649">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-650">`Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-650">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-651">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-651">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-652">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-652">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-653">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-653">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-654">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-654">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-655">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-655">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-656">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-656">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-657">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-657">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-658">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-658">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-659">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-660">한 문자와 선택적 공백 및 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-660">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-661">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-662">한 문자, 7자리 숫자 및 하나의 공백의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-662">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-663">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-663">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-664">하나의 공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-664">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-665">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-665">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-666">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-667">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-667">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-668">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-669">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-669">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-670">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-670">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-671">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-671">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-692">오스트리아 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-692">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-693">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-693">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-694">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-695">지정된 형식의 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-695">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-696">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-697">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-697">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-698">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-698">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-699">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-699">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-700">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-700">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-701">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-702">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-702">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-703">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-704">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-704">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-705">'Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-705">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-706">_or_equivalent 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-706">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-707">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-707">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-708">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-708">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-709">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-709">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-725">오스트리아 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-725">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-726">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-727">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-727">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-728">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-729">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-729">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-730">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-730">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-731">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-731">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-732">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-732">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-733">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-733">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-734">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-734">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-735">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-736">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-736">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-737">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-738">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-738">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-739">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-739">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-740">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-740">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-741">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-741">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-742">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-742">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-765">오스트리아 부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-765">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-766">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-766">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-767">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-767">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-768">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-768">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-769">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-769">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-770">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-770">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-771">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-771">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-772">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-773">11자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-773">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-774">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-775">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-775">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-776">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-776">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-777">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-777">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-778">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-778">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-779">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-779">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-780">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-780">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-781">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-781">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-782">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-782">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-783">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-783">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-784">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-784">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-785">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-785">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-786">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-787">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-787">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-788">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-788">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-789">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-789">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-790">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-790">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-791">검색된 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-791">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-792">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-792">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-793">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-793">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-794">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-794">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-795">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-795">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-796">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-796">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-797">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-797">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-798">austrian vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-798">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-799">vat no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-799">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-800">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-800">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-801">부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-801">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-802">austrian vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-802">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-803">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-803">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-804">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-804">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-805">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-805">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-806">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-806">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-807">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-807">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-808">vat identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-808">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-809">atu number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-809">atu number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-810">uid number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-810">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-811">Azure DocumentDB auth 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-811">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-812">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-813">문자열 "DocumentDb", 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-813">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-814">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-814">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-815">문자열 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-815">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-816">3-200자 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-816">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-817">기호(>), 등호(=), 큰 물음표(") 또는 아포스트로피(')입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-817">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-818">소문자 또는 대문자 86자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-818">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-819">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-819">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-820">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-821">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-821">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-822">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-823">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-823">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-824">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-824">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-825">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-825">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-826">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-826">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-827">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-827">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-828">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-828">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-829">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-829">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-830">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-830">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-831">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-831">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-832">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-832">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-833">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-833">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-834">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-834">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-835">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-835">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-836">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-836">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-837">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-837">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-838">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-838">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-839">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-839">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-840">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-840">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-841">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-842">문자열 "Server", "server", "data source" 및 그 다음에 문자열 "cloudapp.azure"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-842">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-843">com" 또는 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-843">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-844">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-844">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-845">net", 문자열 "Password" 또는 "password" 또는 "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-845">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-846">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-846">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-847">문자열 "Server", "server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-847">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-848">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-848">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-849">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-849">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-850">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-850">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-851">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-851">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-852">문자열 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-852">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-853">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-853">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-854">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-854">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-855">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-855">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-856">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-856">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-857">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-857">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-858">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-858">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-859">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-859">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-860">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-860">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-861">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-861">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-862">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-862">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-863">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-864">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-864">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-865">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-866">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-866">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-867">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-867">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-868">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-868">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-869">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-869">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-883">Azure IoT 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-883">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-884">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-884">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-885">문자열 "HostName" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열("azure-devices" 문자열 포함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-885">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-886">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-886">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-887">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-887">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-888">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-888">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-889">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-889">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-890">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-890">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-891">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-891">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-892">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-892">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-893">문자열 "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-893">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-894">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-894">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-895">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-895">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-896">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-896">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-897">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-897">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-898">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-898">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-899">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-899">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-900">소문자 또는 대문자 43자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-900">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-901">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-901">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-902">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-903">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-903">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-904">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-905">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-905">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-906">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-906">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-907">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-907">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
