- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-915">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-915">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-916">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-916">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-917">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-917">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-918">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-918">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-919">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-919">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-920">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-920">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-921">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-921">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-922">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-922">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-923">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-923">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-924">"userpwd=" 문자열 다음에 영문 문자열이 오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-924">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-925">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-925">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-926">문자열 "userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-926">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-927">소문자 60자 또는 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-927">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-928">인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-928">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-929">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-929">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-930">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-930">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-931">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-931">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-932">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-932">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-933">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-933">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-934">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-934">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-935">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-935">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-936">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-936">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-937">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-937">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-941">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-941">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-942">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-942">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-943">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-943">localhost</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-949">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-949">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-950">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-951">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-951">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-952">net" 다음에 문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-952">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-953">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-953">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-954">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-954">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-955">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-955">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-956">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-956">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-957">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-957">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-958">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-958">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-959">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-959">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-960">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-960">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-961">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-961">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-962">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-962">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-963">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-963">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-964">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-964">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-965">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-965">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-966">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-966">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-967">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-967">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-968">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-968">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-969">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-969">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-970">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-970">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-983">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-983">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-984">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-984">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-985">문자열 "sig", 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-985">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-986">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-986">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-987">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-987">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-988">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-988">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-989">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-989">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-990">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-990">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-991">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%) 중 소문자 또는 대문자인 43-53자 사이의 모든 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-991">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-992">문자열 "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-992">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-993">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-993">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-994">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-995">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-995">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-996">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-997">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-997">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-998">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-998">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-999">Azure 서비스 버스 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-999">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1000">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1001">문자열 "EndPoint" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열("servicebus.windows" 문자열 포함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1001">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1002">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1002">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1003">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1004">문자열 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1004">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1005">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1005">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1006">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1006">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1007">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1007">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1008">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1008">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1009">문자열 "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1009">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1010">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1010">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1011">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1011">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1012">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1012">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1013">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1013">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1014">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1014">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1015">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1015">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1016">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1016">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1017">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1017">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1018">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1018">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1019">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1019">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1020">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1020">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1021">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1021">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1022">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1022">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1023">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1023">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1025">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1025">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1031">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1031">onebox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1033">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1033">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1034">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1034">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1035">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1035">com</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1038">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1038">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1039">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1039">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1040">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열 다음에 문자열 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1040">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1041">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1041">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1042">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1042">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1043">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1043">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1044">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1044">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1045">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1045">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1046">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1046">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1047">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1047">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1048">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1048">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1049">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1049">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1050">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1050">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1051">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1051">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1052">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1052">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1053">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1053">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1054">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1054">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1055">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1055">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1056">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1056">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1057">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1057">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1058">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1058">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1059">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1059">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1060">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1060">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1061">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1061">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1062">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1062">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1064">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1064">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1077">Azure 저장소 계정 키(일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1077">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1078">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1078">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1079">아래 패턴에 설명된 86자 이하 또는 대문자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1079">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1080">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1080">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1081">기호(>), 아포스트로피('), 등호(=), 따오기 기호(") 또는 숫자 기호(#) 중 하나까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1081">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1082">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1082">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1083">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1083">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1084">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1084">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1085">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1085">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1086">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1086">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1087">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1087">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1088">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1088">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1089">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1089">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1090">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1091">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1091">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1092">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1093">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1093">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1094">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1095">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1095">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1096">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1097">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1097">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1098">`Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1098">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1099">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1099">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1232">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1232">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1233">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1234">11자리 숫자와 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1234">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1235">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1236">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1236">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1237">YY 형식의 6자리 숫자와 두 개의 선택적 기간 MM.DD 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1237">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1238">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1238">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1239">3개의 일차 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 홀수)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1239">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1240">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1240">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1241">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1241">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1242">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1242">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1243">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1243">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1244">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1244">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1245">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1245">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1246">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1246">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1247">검색된 Keyword_belgium_national_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1247">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1248">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1248">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1249">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1250">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1250">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1251">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1251">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1310">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1310">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1311">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1311">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1312">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1312">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1313">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 문자가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1313">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1314">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1314">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1315">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1315">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1316">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1316">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1317">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1317">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1318">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1318">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1319">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1319">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1320">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1320">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1321">키워드가  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1321">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1345">벨기에 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1345">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1346">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1346">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1347">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1347">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1348">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1348">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1349">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1349">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1350">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1350">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1351">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1352">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1352">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1353">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1354">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1354">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1355">이  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1355">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1356">키워드가  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1356">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1357">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1357">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1358">이  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1358">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1378">벨기에 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1378">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1379">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1379">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1380">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1380">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1381">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1381">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1382">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1382">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1383">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1383">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1384">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1384">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1385">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1385">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1386">12자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1386">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1387">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1387">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1388">12자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1388">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1389">문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1389">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1390">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1390">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1391">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1391">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1392">1에서 9까지의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1392">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1393">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1393">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1394">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1394">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1395">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1395">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1396">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1396">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1397">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1397">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1398">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1398">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1399">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1399">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1400">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1400">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1401">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1401">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1402">검색된 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1402">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1403">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1403">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1404">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1404">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1416">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1416">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1417">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1418">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1418">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1419">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1420">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1420">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1421">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1421">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1422">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1422">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1423">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1423">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1424">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1424">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1425">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1425">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1426">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1426">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1427">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1427">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1428">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1428">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1429">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1429">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1430">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1430">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1431">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1431">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1432">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1432">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1433">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1433">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1434">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1434">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1435">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cpf 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1435">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1436">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1436">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1437">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1437">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1438">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1438">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1439">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1439">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1451">브라질 법인 번호(CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1451">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1452">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1453">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1453">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1454">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1454">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1455">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1455">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1456">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1456">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1457">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1457">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1458">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1458">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1459">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1459">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1460">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1460">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1461">슬래시(슬래시)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1461">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1462">4자리 분기 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1462">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1463">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1463">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1464">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1464">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1465">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1466">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1466">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1467">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1468">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1468">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1469">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1469">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1470">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1470">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1471">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1471">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1472">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1472">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1473">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1473">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1474">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1474">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1496">브라질 RG(국가 ID 카드)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1496">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1497">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1498">Registro Geral(이전 형식): 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1498">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1499">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식): 11자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1499">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1500">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1501">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1501">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1502">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1502">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1503">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1503">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1504">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1504">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1505">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1505">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1506">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1506">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1507">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1507">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1508">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1508">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1509">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1509">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1510">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1510">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1511">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1511">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1512">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1512">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1513">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1513">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1514">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1514">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1515">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1515">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1516">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1516">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1517">이 Func_brazil_rg 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1517">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1518">검색된 Keyword_brazil_rg 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1518">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1519">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1519">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1520">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1520">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1521">이 Func_brazil_rg 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1521">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1522">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1522">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1523">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1523">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1525">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1525">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1526">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1526">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1527">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1527">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1528">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1528">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1529">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1529">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1530">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1530">registro geral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1532">RIC(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1532">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1533">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1533">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1534">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1534">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1535">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1535">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1536">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1536">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1537">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1537">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1538">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1538">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1539">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1539">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1540">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1540">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1541">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1541">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1542">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1542">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1543">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1543">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1670">불가리아 uniform의 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1670">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1671">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1671">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1672">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1672">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1673">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1673">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1674">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1674">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1675">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1675">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1676">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1676">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1677">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1677">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1678">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1678">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1679">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1679">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1680">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1680">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1681">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1681">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1682">생년월일 순서에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1682">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1683">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자: 남성의 1자리 숫자와 여성의 홀수 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1683">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1684">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1684">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1685">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1686">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1686">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1687">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1688">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1688">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1689">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1689">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1690">키워드가  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1690">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1691">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1692">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1692">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1737">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1737">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1738">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1738">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1739">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1740">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1740">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1741">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1741">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1742">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1742">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1743">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1743">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1744">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1744">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1745">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1745">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1746">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1746">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1747">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1747">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1748">키워드가  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1748">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common`is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1765">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1765">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1766">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1767">7 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1767">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1768">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1769">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1769">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1770">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1770">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1771">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1771">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1772">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1772">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1773">3자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1773">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1774">0 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1774">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1775">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1775">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1776">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1777">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1777">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1778">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1779">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1779">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1780">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1780">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1781">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1781">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1782">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1782">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1783">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1783">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1784">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1784">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1785">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1785">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1809">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1809">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1810">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1810">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1811">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1811">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1812">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1812">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1813">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1813">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1814">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1815">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1815">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1816">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1817">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1817">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1818">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1818">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1819">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1819">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1820">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1820">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1821">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1821">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1826">DL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1826">DL</span></span>
