## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1956">캐나다 보건 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1956">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1957">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1957">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1958">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1958">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1959">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1959">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1960">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1960">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1961">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1961">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1962">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1962">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1963">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1963">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1964">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1964">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1965">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1965">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1966">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1966">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1968">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1968">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1978">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1978">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1979">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1979">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1980">대문자 2개와 숫자 6자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1980">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1981">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1981">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1982">대문자 2개와 숫자 6자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1982">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1983">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1984">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1984">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1985">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1986">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1986">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1987">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1987">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-1988">또는 Keyword_canada_passport_number 키워드가 Keyword_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-1988">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2018">캐나다 PHIN(개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2018">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2019">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2019">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2020">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2020">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2021">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2021">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2022">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2022">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2023">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2024">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2024">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2025">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2026">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2027">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2027">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2028">검색된 키워드 또는 Keyword_canada_phin 키워드가 Keyword_canada_provinces 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2028">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2061">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2061">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2062">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2063">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2063">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2064">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2065">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2065">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2066">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2066">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2067">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2067">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2068">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2068">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2069">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2069">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2070">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2070">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2071">무형: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2071">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2072">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2073">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2073">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2074">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2075">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2075">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2076">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2076">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2077">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2077">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2078">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2078">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2079">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2079">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2080">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2080">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2081">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2081">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2082">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2082">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2083">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2083">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2084">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2084">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2085">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2085">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2110">칠레 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2110">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2111">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2112">7-8자리 숫자와 검사 숫자 또는 문자를 더한 세분화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2112">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2113">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2114">7~8자리 숫자와 디지타이터:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2114">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2115">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2115">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2116">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2116">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2117">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2117">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2118">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2118">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2119">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2119">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2120">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2120">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2121">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2121">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2122">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2123">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2124">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2125">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2126">이 Func_chile_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2126">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2127">검색된 Keyword_chile_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2127">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2128">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2128">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2129">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2130">이 Func_chile_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2130">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2131">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2168">중국 상주 ID 카드(PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2168">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2169">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2169">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2170">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2170">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2171">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2171">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2172">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2172">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2173">주소 코드인 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2173">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2174">생년월일인 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2174">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2175">주문 코드인 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2175">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2176">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2176">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2177">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2177">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2178">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2178">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2179">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2179">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2180">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2180">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2181">이 Func_china_resident_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2181">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2182">검색된 Keyword_china_resident_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2182">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2183">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2183">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2184">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2185">이 Func_china_resident_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2185">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2186">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2186">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2199">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2199">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2200">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2201">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는(dddd) 및 Luhn 테스트를 통과해야 하는 14-16자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2201">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2202">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2203">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2203">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2204">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2205">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2205">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2206">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2207">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2207">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2208">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2208">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2209">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2209">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2210">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2210">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2211">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2211">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2212">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2212">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2213">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2213">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2214">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2214">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2215">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2215">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2216">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2216">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2476">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2476">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2477">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2478">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2478">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2479">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2480">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2480">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2481">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2482">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2482">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2483">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2484">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2485">`Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2485">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2486">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2486">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2610">크로아티아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2610">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2611">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2611">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2612">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2612">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2613">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2613">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2614">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2614">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2615">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2615">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2616">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2617">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2617">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2618">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2619">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2619">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2620">이 Func_croatia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2620">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2621">검색된 Keyword_croatia_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2621">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2652">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2652">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2653">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2653">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2654">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2655">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2655">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2656">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2657">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2657">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2658">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2659">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2659">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2660">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2661">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2661">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2662">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2662">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2663">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2663">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2664">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2664">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2681">크로아티아 개인 식별(OIB) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2681">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2682">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2683">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2683">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2684">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2685">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2685">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2686">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2686">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2687">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2687">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2688">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2689">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2689">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2690">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2691">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2691">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2692">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2692">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2693">검색된 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2693">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2694">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2694">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2696">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2696">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2697">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2697">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2728">크로아티아 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2728">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2729">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2729">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2730">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2731">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2731">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2732">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2733">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2733">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2734">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2734">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2735">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2735">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2736">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2737">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2737">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2738">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2739">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2740">이  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2740">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2741">키워드가  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2741">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2742">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2742">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2743">이  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2743">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2760">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2760">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2761">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2762">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2762">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2763">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2764">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2764">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2765">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2766">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2767">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2768">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2768">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2769">`Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2769">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2770">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2895">키프로스 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2895">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2896">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2896">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2897">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2897">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2898">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2898">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2899">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2899">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2900">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2900">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2901">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2901">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2902">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2903">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2903">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2904">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2905">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2905">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2906">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2907">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2907">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2908">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2909">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2909">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2910">`Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2910">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2911">키워드가  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2911">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2912">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2912">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2914">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2914">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2915">ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2915">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2916">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2916">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2917">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2917">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2918">개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2918">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2919">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2919">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2920">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2920">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2921">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2921">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2922">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2923">1개 문자와 공백 또는분리자 없는 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2923">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2924">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2925">1개의 문자와 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2925">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2926">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2926">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2927">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2927">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2928">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2928">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2929">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2929">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2930">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2930">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2931">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2931">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2948">κυπριακό διαβατήριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2948">κυπριακό διαβατήριο</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2957">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2957">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2958">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2958">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2959">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2959">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2960">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2960">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2961">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2961">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2962">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2962">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2963">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2963">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2964">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2964">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2965">지정된 패턴의 8자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2965">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2966">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2966">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2967">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2967">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2968">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2968">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2969">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2969">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2970">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2970">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2971">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2972">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2972">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2973">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2974">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2974">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2975">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2975">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2976">키워드가  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2976">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2977">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2977">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-2978">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-2978">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3006">체코 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3006">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3007">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3007">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3008">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3008">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3009">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3009">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3010">8개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3010">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3011">문자 'E'(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3011">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3012">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3012">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3013">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3013">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3014">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3014">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3015">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3016">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3016">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3017">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3018">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3018">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3019">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3019">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3020">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3020">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3146">체코 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3146">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3147">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3147">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3148">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3148">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3149">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3149">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3150">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3150">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3151">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3151">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3152">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3152">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3153">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3153">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3154">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3154">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3155">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3155">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3156">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3156">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3157">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3157">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3176">체코어 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3176">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3177">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3178">선택적 슬래시(이전 형식) 10자리 숫자(선택적 슬래시(새 형식)가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3178">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3179">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3180">9자리 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3180">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3181">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3181">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3182">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3182">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3183">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3183">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3184">10자리 숫자(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3184">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3185">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3185">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3186">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3186">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3187">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3187">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3188">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3188">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3189">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3189">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3190">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3190">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3191">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3191">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3192">이 Func_czech_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3192">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3193">검색된 Keyword_czech_id_card 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3193">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3194">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3194">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3195">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3195">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3196">이 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3196">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3197">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3197">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3244">체코 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3244">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3245">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3245">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3246">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3247">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 백래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3247">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3248">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3249">10자리 숫자 및 백사시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3249">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3250">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3250">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3251">백 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3251">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3252">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3252">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3253">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3253">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3254">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3255">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3255">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3256">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3257">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3257">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3258">이  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3258">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3259">키워드가  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3259">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3260">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3260">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3261">이  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3261">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3277">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3277">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3278">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3279">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3279">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3280">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3280">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3281">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3281">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3282">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3283">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3283">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3284">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3285">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3285">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3286">`Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3286">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3287">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3287">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3411">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3411">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3412">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3412">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3413">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3414">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3414">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3415">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3416">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3416">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3417">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3418">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3418">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3419">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3420">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3421">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3421">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3422">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3422">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3439">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3439">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3440">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3441">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3441">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3442">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3443">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3443">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3444">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3444">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3445">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3445">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3446">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3446">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3447">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3448">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3448">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3449">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3450">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3451">정규식은 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3451">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3452">검색된 Keyword_denmark_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3452">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3453">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3453">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3454">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3454">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3455">정규식은 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3455">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3456">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3456">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
