## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3528">덴마크 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3528">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3529">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3529">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3530">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3531">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3531">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3532">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3533">10자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3533">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3534">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3534">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3535">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3535">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3536">시퀀스 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3536">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3537">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3538">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3538">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3539">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3540">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3540">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3541">이  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3541">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3542">키워드가  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3542">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3543">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3543">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3544">이  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3544">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3545">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3545">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3546">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3546">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3550">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3550">nationalnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3555">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3555">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3556">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3556">cpr-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3557">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3557">personnummer</span></span>


## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3558">DEA(마약 집행 기구) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3558">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3559">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3559">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3560">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3560">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3561">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3561">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3562">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3562">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3563">가능한 문자 집합에서 대/소문자를 구분하지 않는 한 문자, 즉 등록자 코드인 abcdefghjklmnprstux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3563">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3564">한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )는 등록자 성 또는 숫자 '9'의 첫 문자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3564">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3565">7자리 숫자( 마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3565">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3566">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3567">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3567">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3568">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3569">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3570">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3570">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3571">키워드가 `Keyword_dea_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3571">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3572">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3572">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3573">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3573">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3574">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3574">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3575">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3575">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3576">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3576">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3577">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3577">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3578">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3578">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3579">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3579">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3580">약 시행 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3580">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3581">약 집행 기관</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3581">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3582">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3582">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3583">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3583">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3584">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3584">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3585">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3585">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3586">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3586">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3587">문자 "ET"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3587">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3588">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3588">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3589">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3589">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3590">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3590">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3591">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3591">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3592">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3592">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3593">`Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3593">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3594">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3594">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3721">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3721">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3722">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3722">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3723">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3723">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3724">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3724">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3725">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3725">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3726">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3726">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3727">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3728">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3728">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3729">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3730">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3730">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3731">생년월일과 생년월일(홀수 남성, 1~2세대, 1-2세대, 3-4: 20년, 5~6: 21 세기)에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3731">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3732">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3732">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3733">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3733">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3734">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3734">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3735">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3736">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3736">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3737">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3738">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3738">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3739">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3739">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3740">키워드가  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3740">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3741">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3741">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3742">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3742">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3775">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3775">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3776">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3776">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3777">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3777">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3778">문자 한 개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3778">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3779">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3779">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3780">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3780">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3781">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3781">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3782">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3782">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3783">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3783">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3784">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3784">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3785">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3785">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3786">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3786">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3787">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3787">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3788">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3788">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3789">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3789">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3790">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3790">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3791">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3791">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3792">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3792">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3793">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3793">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3794">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3794">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3795">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3795">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3796">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3796">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3797">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3797">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3798">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3798">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3799">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3799">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3800">eesti kodaniku passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3800">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3801">유럽 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3801">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3802">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3803">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3803">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3804">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3804">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3805">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3805">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3806">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3807">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3807">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3808">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3809">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3809">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3810">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3810">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3811">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3811">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3812">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3812">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3813">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3813">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3814">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3814">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3815">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3815">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3816">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3816">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-3817">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-3817">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4263">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4263">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4264">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4265">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4265">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4266">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4267">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4267">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4268">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4268">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4269">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4269">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4270">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4270">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4271">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4271">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4272">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4273">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4273">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4274">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4275">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4276">`Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4276">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4277">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4277">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4408">핀란드 유럽 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4408">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4409">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4409">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4410">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4410">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4411">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4411">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4412">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4412">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4413">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4413">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4414">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4414">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4415">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4416">20자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4416">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4417">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4418">20자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4418">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4419">10자리 숫자 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4419">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4420">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4420">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4421">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4421">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4422">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4423">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4423">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4424">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4425">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4425">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4426">regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4426">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4427">검색된 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4427">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4445">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4445">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4446">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4447">6자리 숫자와 세 번째 숫자와 검사 숫자를 더한 세 자리 숫자를 나타내는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4447">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4448">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4449">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4449">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4450">생년월일 형식 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4450">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4451">century marker('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4451">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4452">3자리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4452">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4453">검사 숫자인 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 미구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4453">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4454">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4454">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4455">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4455">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4456">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4456">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4457">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4458">해당 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4458">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4459">찾은 Keyword_finnish_national_id 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4459">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4460">체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4460">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4461">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4461">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4462">해당 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4462">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4463">체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4463">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4512">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4512">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4513">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4513">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4514">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4514">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4515">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4515">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4516">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4516">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4517">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4517">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4518">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4518">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4519">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4519">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4520">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4521">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4522">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4523">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4523">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4524">정규식은 Regex_finland_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4524">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4525">검색된 Keywords_eu_passport_number_common Keyword_finland_passport_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4525">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4526">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4526">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4546">핀란드 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4546">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4547">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4547">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4548">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4548">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4549">지정된 형식의 11자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4549">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4550">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4550">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4551">지정된 형식의 11자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4551">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4552">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4552">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4553">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4553">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4554">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4554">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4555">minus 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4555">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4556">문자 "A"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4556">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4557">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4557">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4558">한 문자 또는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4558">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4559">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4560">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4560">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4561">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4562">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4562">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4563">이  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4563">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4564">키워드가  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4564">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4565">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4565">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4566">이  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4566">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4590">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4590">France driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4591">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4592">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4592">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4593">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4594">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4594">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4595">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4596">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4596">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4597">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4598">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4599">이 Func_french_drivers_license 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4599">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4600">검색된 Keyword_french_drivers_license 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4600">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4727">프랑스 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4727">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4728">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4728">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4729">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4729">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4730">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4730">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4731">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4731">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4732">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4732">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4733">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4733">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4734">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4734">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4735">21자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4735">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4736">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4736">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4737">21자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4737">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4738">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4738">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4739">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4739">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4740">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4740">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4741">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4741">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4742">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4742">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4743">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4743">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4744">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4744">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4745">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4745">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4746">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4746">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4747">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4747">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4748">검색된 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4748">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4749">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4749">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4750">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4750">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4751">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4751">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4752">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4752">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4753">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4753">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4754">프랑스 국가 ID 카드(CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4754">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4755">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4756">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4756">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4757">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4758">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4758">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4759">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4760">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4760">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4761">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4762">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4762">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4763">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4763">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4764">검색된 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4764">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4765">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4765">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4766">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4766">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4767">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4767">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4769">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4769">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4770">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4770">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4771">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4771">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4772">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4772">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4773">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4773">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4774">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4774">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4775">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4775">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4776">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4776">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4778">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4778">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4779">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4779">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4780">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4781">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4781">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4783">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4783">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4784">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4784">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4785">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4785">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4786">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4786">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4787">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4788">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4788">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4789">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4790">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4790">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4791">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4791">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4792">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4792">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4813">프랑스 사회 보장 번호(INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4813">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4814">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 및 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4814">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4815">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4815">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4816">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4816">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4817">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4817">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4818">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4818">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4819">13자리 숫자와 공백, 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4819">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4820">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4820">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4821">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4821">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4822">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4822">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4823">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4823">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4824">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4824">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4825">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4825">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4826">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4826">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4827">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4827">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4828">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4828">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4829">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4829">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4830">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4830">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4831">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4831">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4832">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4832">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4858">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4858">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4859">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4860">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4860">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4861">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4862">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4862">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4863">0, 1, 2 또는 3이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4863">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4864">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4864">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4865">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4865">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4866">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4866">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4867">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4867">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4868">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4868">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4869">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4869">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4870">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4870">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4871">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4871">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4872">검사 숫자 3개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4872">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4873">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4874">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4874">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4876">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4876">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4877">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4877">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4878">키워드가  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4878">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4879">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4880">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4880">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4896">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4896">taxnumber</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4900">프랑스 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4900">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4901">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4901">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4902">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4902">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4903">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4903">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4904">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4904">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4905">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4905">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4906">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4906">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4907">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4907">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4908">영문자 13자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4908">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4909">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4909">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4910">13자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4910">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4911">두 글자 - FR(대소문자 미구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4911">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4912">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4912">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4913">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4913">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4914">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4914">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4915">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4915">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4916">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4916">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4917">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4917">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4918">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4918">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4919">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4919">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4920">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4921">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4921">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4922">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4923">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4923">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4924">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4924">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4925">검색된 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4925">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4926">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4926">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4927">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4927">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4940">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4940">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4941">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4941">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4942">11자리 숫자 및 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4942">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4943">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4943">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4944">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4944">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4945">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4945">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4946">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4946">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4947">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4947">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4948">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4948">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4949">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4949">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4950">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4950">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4951">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4951">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4952">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4952">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4953">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4953">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4954">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4954">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4955">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4955">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-4956">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-4956">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5105">독일 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5105">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5106">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5106">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5107">2010년 11월 1일 이후: 9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5107">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5108">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지: 10자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5108">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5110">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5110">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5111">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5111">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5112">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5112">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5113">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5113">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5114">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5114">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5115">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5116">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5116">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5117">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5118">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5118">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5119">정규식은 Regex_germany_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5119">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5120">검색된 Keyword_germany_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5120">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
