## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5136">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5136">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5137">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5137">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5138">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5139">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5139">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5140">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5141">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5141">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5142">첫 문자는 이 집합의 숫자 또는 문자(C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5142">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5143">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5143">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5144">이 집합의 5자리 숫자 또는 문자(C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5144">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5145">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5145">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5146">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5147">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5147">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5148">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5149">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5149">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5150">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5150">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5151">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5151">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5152">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5152">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5153">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5153">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5154">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5154">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5155">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5155">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5156">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5156">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5157">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5157">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5158">Keyword_german_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5158">Keyword_german_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5159">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5159">reisepasse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5160">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5160">reisepassnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5161">No-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5161">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5162">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5162">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5163">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5163">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5164">Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5164">Passnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5165">reisepässe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5165">reisepässe</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5166">passeport no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5166">passeport no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5167">passeport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5167">passeport no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5168">독일 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5168">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5169">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5169">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5170">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5170">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5171">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5171">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5172">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5172">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5173">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5173">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5174">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5174">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5175">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5175">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5176">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5176">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5177">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5177">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5178">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5178">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5179">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5179">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5180">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5180">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5181">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5182">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5182">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5183">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5184">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5184">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5185">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5185">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5186">키워드가  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5186">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5187">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5187">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5188">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5188">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5204">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5204">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5214">독일 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5214">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5215">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5215">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5216">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5216">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5217">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5217">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5218">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5218">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5219">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5219">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5220">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5220">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5221">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5222">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5222">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5223">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5224">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5224">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5225">D 또는 d 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5225">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5226">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5226">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5227">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5227">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5228">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5228">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5229">선택적 공백 또는 콤마</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5229">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5230">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5230">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5231">선택적 공백 또는 콤마</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5231">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5232">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5232">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5233">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5234">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5235">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5236">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5236">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5237">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5237">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5238">검색된 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5238">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5239">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5239">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5240">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5240">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5250">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5250">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5251">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5251">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5252">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5252">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5253">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5253">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5254">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5254">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5255">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5255">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5256">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5256">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5257">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5257">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5258">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5258">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5259">`Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5259">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5260">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5260">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5386">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5386">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5387">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5388">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5388">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5389">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5390">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5390">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5391">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5391">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5392">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5392">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5393">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5393">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5394">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5394">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5395">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5395">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5396">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5396">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5397">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5397">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5398">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5399">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5399">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5400">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5401">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5401">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5402">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5402">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5403">검색된 Keyword_greece_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5403">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5404">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5404">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5405">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5405">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5406">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5406">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5407">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5407">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5408">그리스어 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5408">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5409">그리스어 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5409">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5410">그리스어 개인 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5410">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5411">그리스어 경찰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5411">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5412">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5412">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5413">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5413">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5414">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5414">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5415">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5415">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5416">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5416">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5417">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5417">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5418">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5418">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5419">문자 2개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5419">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5420">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5420">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5421">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5421">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5422">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5423">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5423">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5424">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5425">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5425">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5426">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5426">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5427">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5427">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5428">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5428">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5432">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5432">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5433">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5433">passports</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5440">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5440">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5441">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5441">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5442">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5442">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5443">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5443">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5444">그리스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5444">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5445">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5445">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5446">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5446">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5447">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5447">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5448">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5448">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5449">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5449">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5450">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5450">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5451">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5452">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5452">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5453">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5454">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5454">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5455">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5455">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5456">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5456">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5457">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5457">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5458">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5458">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5459">`Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5459">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5460">키워드가  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5460">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5489">HKID(홍콩 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5489">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5490">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5491">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5491">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5492">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5492">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5493">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5493">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5494">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5494">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5495">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5495">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5496">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5496">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5497">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5498">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5498">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5499">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5500">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5500">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5501">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5501">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5502">검색된 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5502">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5503">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5503">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5504">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5504">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5505">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5505">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5506">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5506">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5546">헝가리 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5546">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5547">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5547">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5548">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5548">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5549">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5549">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5550">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5550">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5551">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5551">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5552">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5552">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5553">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5554">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5554">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5555">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5556">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5556">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5557">`Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5557">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5558">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5558">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5559">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5559">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5560">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5560">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5683">헝가리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5683">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5684">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5684">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5685">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5685">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5686">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5686">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5687">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5687">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5688">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5688">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5689">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5689">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5690">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5690">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5691">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5691">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5692">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5692">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5693">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5693">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5694">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1900년 이전의 여성, 2-여성, 기타 번호는 1900년 이전의 시민 또는 2배 시민권이 있는 시민도 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5694">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5695">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5695">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5696">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5696">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5697">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5697">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5698">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5699">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5699">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5700">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5701">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5701">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5702">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5702">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5703">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5703">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5704">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5705">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5705">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5716">헝가리 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5716">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5717">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5717">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5718">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5719">2개의 문자와 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5719">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5720">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5721">2개의 문자와 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5721">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5722">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5723">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5723">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5724">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5725">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5725">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5726">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5726">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5727">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5727">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5728">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5728">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5732">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5732">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5733">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5733">passports</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5744">헝가리 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5744">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5745">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5745">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5746">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5747">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5747">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5748">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5749">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5749">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5750">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5751">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5751">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5752">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5753">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5754">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5754">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5755">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5755">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5756">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5757">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5757">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5777">헝가리 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5777">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5778">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5778">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5779">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5779">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5780">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5780">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5781">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5781">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5782">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5782">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5783">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5783">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5784">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5785">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5785">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5786">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5787">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5787">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5788">"8"을 입력해야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5788">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5789">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5789">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5790">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5790">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5791">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5791">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5792">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5792">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5793">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5793">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5794">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5794">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5795">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5795">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5796">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5796">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5797">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5797">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5798">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5798">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5824">헝가리 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5824">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5825">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5825">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5826">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5826">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5827">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5827">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5828">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5828">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5829">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5829">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5830">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5830">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5831">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5832">영문자 10자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5832">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5833">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5834">영문자 10자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5834">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5835">2개 문자 - HU 또는 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5835">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5836">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5836">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5837">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5837">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5838">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5838">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5839">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5839">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5840">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5840">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5841">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5841">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5842">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5842">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5843">검색된 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5843">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5844">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5844">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5845">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5845">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5846">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5846">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5847">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5847">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5848">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5848">vat</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5851">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5851">vatno#</span></span>
