- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5855">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5855">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5856">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5856">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5857">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5857">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5858">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5858">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5859">인도 PAN(영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5859">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5860">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5860">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5861">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5861">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5862">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5862">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5863">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5863">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5864">3개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5864">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5865">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 림)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5865">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5866">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5866">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5867">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5867">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5868">문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5868">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5869">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5870">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5870">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5871">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5872">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5872">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5873">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5873">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5874">검색된 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5874">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5875">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5875">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5876">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5876">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5877">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5877">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5878">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5878">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5879">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5879">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5880">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5880">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5881">인도 고유 식별(Aadhaar) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5881">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5882">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5882">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5883">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5883">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5884">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5884">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5885">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5885">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5886">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5886">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5887">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5887">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5888">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5888">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5889">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5889">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5890">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5890">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5891">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5891">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5892">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5892">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5893">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5893">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5894">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5894">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5895">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5895">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5896">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5896">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5897">검색된 Keyword_india_aadhar 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5897">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5898">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5898">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5899">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5899">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5900">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5900">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5901">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5901">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5902">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5902">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5903">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5903">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5904">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5904">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5905">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5905">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5906">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5906">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5907">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5907">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5908">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5908">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5909">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5909">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5910">인도네시아 ID 카드(KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5910">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5911">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5912">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5912">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5913">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5914">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5914">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5915">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5915">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5916">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5916">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5917">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5917">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5918">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5918">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5919">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5919">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5920">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5920">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5921">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5921">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5922">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5922">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5923">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5923">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5924">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5924">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5925">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5925">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5926">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5926">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5927">정규식은 Regex_indonesia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5927">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5928">검색된 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5928">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5929">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5929">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5930">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5930">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5931">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5931">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5932">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5932">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5933">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5933">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5934">IBAN(국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5934">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5935">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5936">국가 코드(2자) 및 체크 숫자(2자리) 및 bban 번호(최대 30자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5936">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5937">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5938">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5938">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5939">2문자 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5939">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5940">검사 숫자 2개(선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5940">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5941">4개의 문자 또는 숫자로 1-7개 그룹(공백으로 구분할 수 있습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5941">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5942">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5942">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5943">각 국가에 대한 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5943">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5944">IBAN 중요한 정보 유형은 다음 60개 국가에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5944">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5945">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5945">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5946">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5947">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5947">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5948">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5949">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5949">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5950">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5950">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5951">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5952">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5952">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5953">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5953">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5954">국제질병 분류(ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5954">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5955">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5955">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5956">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5956">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5957">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5957">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5958">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5958">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5959">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5960">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5960">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5961">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5962">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5962">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5963">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5963">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5964">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5964">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5965">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5965">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5966">업데이트된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5966">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5967">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5967">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5968">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_updated 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5968">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5969">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5969">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5970">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_codes 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5970">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5971">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드를 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5971">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5972">국제질병 분류(ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5972">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5973">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5973">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5974">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5974">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5975">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5975">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5976">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5976">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5977">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5977">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5978">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5978">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5979">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5979">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5980">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5980">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5981">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5981">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5982">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5982">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5983">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5983">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5984">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5984">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5985">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5985">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5986">국제질병 분류Dictionary_icd_9_updated 9번째 수정, [ICD-9-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5986">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5987">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5987">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5988">[ICD-9-CM(ICD-9-CM)의](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)국제 분류인 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5988">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5989">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드를 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5989">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5990">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5990">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5991">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5991">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5992">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5992">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5993">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5993">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5994">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5994">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5995">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5995">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5996">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5996">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5997">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5997">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5998">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5998">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-5999">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-5999">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6000">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6000">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6001">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6001">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6002">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6002">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6003">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6003">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6004">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6004">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6005">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6005">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6006">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6006">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6007">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6007">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6008">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6008">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6009">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6009">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6010">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6010">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6011">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6011">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6012">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6012">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6013">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6013">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6014">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6014">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6015">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6015">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6016">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6016">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6017">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6018">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6018">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6019">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6020">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6020">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6021">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6021">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6022">4개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6022">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6023">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6024">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6024">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6025">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6026">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6027">`Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6027">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6028">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6028">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6152">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6152">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6153">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6153">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6154">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6155">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6155">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6156">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6157">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6157">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6158">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6158">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6159">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6159">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6160">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6161">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6161">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6162">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6163">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6163">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6164">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6164">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6165">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6165">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6186">아일랜드 PPS(개인 공용 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6186">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6187">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6188">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6188">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6189">7자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6189">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6190">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6190">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6191">7자리 숫자와 2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6191">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6192">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6193">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6193">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6194">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6194">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6195">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6195">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6196">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6196">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6197">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6197">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6198">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자(대소문자 구분 안 시)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6198">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6199">범위 A-I 또는 "W"의 선택적 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6199">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6200">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6201">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6201">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6202">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6203">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6203">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6204">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6204">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6205">검색된 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6205">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6206">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6206">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6207">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6207">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6208">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6208">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6209">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6209">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6254">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6254">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6255">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6256">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6256">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6257">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6258">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6258">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6259">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6259">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6260">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6260">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6261">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6261">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6262">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6262">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6263">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6263">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6264">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6264">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6265">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6265">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6266">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6266">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6267">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6267">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6268">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6268">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6269">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6269">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6270">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6270">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6271">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6271">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6272">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6272">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6273">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6273">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6274">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6274">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6275">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6275">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6276">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6276">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6277">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6277">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6278">이스라엘 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6278">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6279">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6280">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6280">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6281">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6282">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6282">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6283">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6283">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6284">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6284">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6285">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6285">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6286">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6286">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6287">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6287">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6288">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6288">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6289">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6289">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6290">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6290">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6291">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6291">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6292">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6292">מספר זהות</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6293">מספר זיה וי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6293">מספר זיה וי</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6294">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6294">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span></span>      
-   <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6295">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6295">זהותישר אלית</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6296">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6296">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6297">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6297">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6308">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6308">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6309">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6310">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6310">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6311">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6312">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6312">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6313">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6313">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6314">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6314">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6315">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6315">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6316">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6316">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6317">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6318">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6318">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6319">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6320">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6320">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6321">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6321">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6322">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6322">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6323">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6323">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6324">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6324">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6325">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6325">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6326">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6326">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6327">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6327">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6328">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6328">patenti di guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6329">patenti guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6329">patenti guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6330">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6330">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6331">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6331">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6332">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6332">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6333">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6333">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6334">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6334">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6335">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6335">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6336">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6336">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6337">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6337">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6338">지정된 패턴의 문자 및 숫자 조합 16자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6338">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6339">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6339">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6340">문자와 숫자의 16자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6340">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6341">패밀리 이름에 있는 처음 세 자위에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6341">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6342">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자국어에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6342">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6343">생년월일의 마지막 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6343">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6344">생년월일의 문자에 해당하는 한 문자- 문자는 사전순으로 사용되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에서 T까지의 문자만 사용됩니다(따라서 1월은 A, 10월은 R임).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6344">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6345">성별을 차별화하기 위해 생년월일에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자는 여성의 생년월일에 40이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6345">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6346">사람이 태어났던 시정구와 관련한 지역 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자(국가 전체 코드가 외국가에 사용)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6346">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6347">패리티 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6347">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6348">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6348">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6349">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6349">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6350">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6350">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6351">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6351">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6352">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6352">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6353">키워드가  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6353">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6354">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6354">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6355">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6355">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6390">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6390">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6391">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6391">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6392">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6393">2개의 문자 또는 숫자 다음에 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6393">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6394">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6395">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6395">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6396">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6396">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6397">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6397">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6398">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6399">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6399">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6400">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6401">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6402">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6402">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6403">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6403">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6424">이탈리아 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6424">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6425">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6425">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6426">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6426">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6427">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6427">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6428">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6428">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6429">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6429">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6430">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6430">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6431">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6432">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6432">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6433">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6434">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6434">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6435">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6435">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6436">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6436">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6437">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6437">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6438">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6438">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6439">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6439">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6440">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6440">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6441">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6441">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6442">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6442">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6443">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6443">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6444">검색된 키워드가 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6444">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6445">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6445">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6446">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6446">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6448">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6448">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6454">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6454">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6455">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6456">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6456">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6457">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6458">bank account number:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6458">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6459">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6459">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6460">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6460">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6461">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6461">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6462">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6462">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6463">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6463">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6464">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6464">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6465">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6465">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6466">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6466">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6467">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6467">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6468">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6468">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6469">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6469">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6470">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6470">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6471">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6471">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6472">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6472">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6473">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6473">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6474">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6474">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6475">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6475">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6522">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6522">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6523">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6524">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6524">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6525">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6525">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6526">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6526">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6527">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6527">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6528">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6528">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6529">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6529">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6530">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6530">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6531">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6531">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6532">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6532">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
