## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6570">일본 내 번호 - 회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6570">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6571">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6571">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6572">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6572">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6573">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6573">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6574">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6574">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6575">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6575">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6576">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6576">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6577">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6578">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6578">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6579">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6580">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6580">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6581">1자리에서 9자리까지의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6581">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6582">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6582">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6583">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6583">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6584">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6584">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6585">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6585">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6586">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6586">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6587">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6587">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6588">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6588">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6589">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6589">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6590">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6590">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6603">일본 내 번호 - 개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6603">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6604">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6604">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6605">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6605">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6606">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6606">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6607">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6607">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6608">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6608">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6609">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6609">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6610">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6611">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6611">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6612">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6613">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6613">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6614">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6614">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6615">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6615">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6616">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6616">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6617">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6617">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6618">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6618">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6619">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6620">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6620">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6621">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6622">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6622">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6623">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6623">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6624">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6624">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6625">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6625">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6626">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6626">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6628">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6628">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6629">my number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6629">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6630">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6630">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6631">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6631">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6632">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6632">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6633">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6633">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6634">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6634">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6635">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6635">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6636">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6636">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6637">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6637">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6638">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6638">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6639">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6639">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6640">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6641">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6641">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6642">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6643">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6643">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6644">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6645">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6645">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6646">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6647">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6647">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6648">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6648">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6649">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6649">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6650">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6650">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6651">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6651">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6652">Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6652">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6653">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6653">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6654">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6654">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6655">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6655">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6656">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6656">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6657">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6657">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6658">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6658">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6659">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6659">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6660">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6660">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6661">೺೺固</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6661">パスポートNo.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6663">旅券番号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6663">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6664">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6664">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6665">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6665">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6666">일본 거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6666">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6667">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6668">12개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6668">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6669">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6670">12개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6670">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6671">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6671">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6672">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6672">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6673">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6673">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6674">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6675">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6675">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6676">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6677">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6678">정규식은 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6678">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6679">검색된 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6679">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6680">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6680">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6681">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6681">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6682">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6682">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6683">거주 카드 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6683">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6684">거주 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6684">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6685">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6685">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6686">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6686">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6687">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6687">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6688">일본 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6688">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6689">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6690">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6690">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6691">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6692">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6692">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6693">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6694">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6694">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6695">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6696">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6696">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6697">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6697">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6698">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6698">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6699">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6699">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6700">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6700">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6701">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6701">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6702">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6702">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6703">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6703">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6704">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6704">Resident Register No.</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6711">일본 SIN(사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6711">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6712">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6713">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6713">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6714">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6715">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6715">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6716">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6716">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6717">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6717">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6718">6자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6718">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6719">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6719">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6720">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6721">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6721">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6722">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6723">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6723">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6724">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6724">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6725">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6725">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6726">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6727">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6727">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6728">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6728">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6749">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6749">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6750">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6750">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6751">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6751">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6752">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6752">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6753">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6753">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6754">3개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6754">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6755">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6755">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6756">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6757">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6757">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6758">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6759">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6759">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6760">`Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6760">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6761">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6761">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6886">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6886">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6887">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6887">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6888">11자리 숫자 및 하이픈(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6888">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6889">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6889">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6890">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6890">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6891">11자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6891">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6892">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6892">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6893">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6893">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6894">생년월일 세기(19세기의 경우 "0", 20년의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6894">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6895">4자리 숫자(임의로 생성)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6895">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6896">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6896">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6897">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6897">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6898">2자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6898">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6899">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6899">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6900">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6900">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6901">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6901">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6902">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6902">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6903">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6903">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6904">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6904">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6905">키워드가  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6905">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6906">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6906">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6907">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6907">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6970">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6970">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6971">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6971">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6972">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6972">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6973">2개의 문자 또는 숫자, 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6973">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6974">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6974">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6975">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6975">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6976">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6976">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6977">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6977">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6978">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6979">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6979">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6980">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6981">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6981">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6982">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6982">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-6983">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-6983">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7003">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7003">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7004">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7005">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7005">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7006">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7007">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7007">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7008">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7009">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7009">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7010">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7011">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7012">`Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7012">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7013">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7013">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7138">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7138">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7139">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7139">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7140">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7140">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7141">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7141">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7142">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7142">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7143">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7143">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7144">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7144">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7145">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7146">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7146">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7147">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7148">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7148">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7149">생년월일과 성별에 해당하는 1-6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7149">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7150">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7150">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7151">생년월일 일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7151">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7152">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7152">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7153">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7154">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7154">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7155">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7156">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7156">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7157">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7157">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7158">키워드가  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7158">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7159">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7160">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7160">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7195">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7195">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7196">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7196">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7197">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7197">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7198">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7198">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7199">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7199">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7200">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7200">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7201">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7202">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7202">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7203">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7204">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7204">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7205">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7205">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7206">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7206">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7223">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7223">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7224">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7225">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7225">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7226">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7227">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7227">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7228">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7229">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7231">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7232">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7232">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7233">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7233">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7357">룩세르부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7357">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7358">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7358">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7359">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7359">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7360">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7360">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7361">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7361">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7362">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7362">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7363">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7363">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7364">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7365">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7365">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7366">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7367">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7367">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7368">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7368">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7369">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7369">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7370">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7371">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7371">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7372">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7373">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7373">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7374">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7374">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7375">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7375">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7376">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7376">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7377">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7377">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7400">룩세르버그 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7400">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7401">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7401">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7402">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7403">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7403">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7404">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7405">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7405">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7406">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7407">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7407">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7408">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7409">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7410">`Regex_nation_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7410">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7411">키워드가  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7411">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7412">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7412">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7413">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7413">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7414">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7414">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7415">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7415">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7416">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7416">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7417">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7417">passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7418">룩세르부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인이 아닌 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7418">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7419">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7420">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7420">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7421">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7422">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7422">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7423">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7423">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7424">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7424">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7425">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7425">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7426">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7426">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7427">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7427">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7428">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7428">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7429">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7429">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7430">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7430">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7431">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7432">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7432">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7433">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7434">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7434">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7435">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7435">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7436">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7436">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7437">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7437">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7438">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7438">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7478">말레이시아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7478">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7479">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7479">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7480">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7480">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7481">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7481">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7482">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7482">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7483">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7483">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7484">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7484">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7485">생년월일 코드 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7485">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7486">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7486">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7487">3개의 임의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7487">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7488">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7488">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7489">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7490">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7490">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7491">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7492">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7492">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7493">정규식은 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7493">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7494">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7494">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7495">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7495">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_malaysia_id_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7496">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7496">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7497">디지털 응용 프로그램 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7497">digital application card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7498">i/c</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7498">i/c</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7499">i/c no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7499">i/c no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7500">ic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7500">ic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7501">ic no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7501">ic no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7502">id card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7502">id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7503">identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7503">identification Card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7504">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7504">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7505">k/p</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7505">k/p</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7521">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7521">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7522">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7522">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7523">지정한 패턴의 2자 및 6자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7523">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7524">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7524">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7525">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7525">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7526">2자(숫자 또는 문자, 대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7526">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7527">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7527">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7528">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7528">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7529">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7529">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7530">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7530">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7531">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7532">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7532">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7533">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7534">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7535">`Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7535">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7536">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7536">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7660">몰타 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7660">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7661">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7661">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7662">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7662">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7663">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7663">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7664">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7664">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7665">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7665">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7666">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7666">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7667">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7668">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7668">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7669">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7670">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7670">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7671">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7671">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7672">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자(대소문자 미정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7672">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7673">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7674">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7674">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7675">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7676">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7676">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7677">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7677">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7678">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7678">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7679">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7679">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7680">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7680">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7686">kodiċi 개인 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7686">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7688">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7688">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7689">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7689">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7690">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7690">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7691">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7691">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7692">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7692">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7694">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7694">unique identification number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7697">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7697">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7698">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7698">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7699">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7699">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7700">공백 또는 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7700">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7701">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7701">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7702">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7702">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7703">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7704">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7704">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7705">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7706">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7706">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7707">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7707">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7708">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7708">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7709">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7709">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7713">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7713">passportid</span></span>
