## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7725">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7725">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7726">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7727">몰타 국가:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7727">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7728">지정된 패턴의 7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7728">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7729">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7729">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7730">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7730">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7731">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7731">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7732">몰타 국가: 7자리 숫자 및 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7732">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7733">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7733">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7734">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7734">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7735">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7735">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7736">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7736">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7737">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7737">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7738">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7738">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7739">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7739">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7740">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7740">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7741">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7741">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7742">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7742">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7743">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7743">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7744">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7744">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7777">네덜란드 시민 서비스(BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7777">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7778">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7779">선택적 공백을 포함하는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7779">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7780">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7781">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7781">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7782">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7782">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7783">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7783">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7784">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7784">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7785">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7785">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7786">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7786">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7787">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7788">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7789">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7790">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7791">이 Func_netherlands_bsn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7791">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7792">검색된 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7792">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7793">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7793">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7817">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7817">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7818">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7819">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7819">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7820">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7821">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7821">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7822">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7822">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7823">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7823">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7824">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7824">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7825">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7825">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7826">`Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7826">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7827">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7827">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7828">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7828">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7955">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7955">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7956">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7956">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7957">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7957">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7958">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7958">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7959">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7959">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7960">9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7960">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7961">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7961">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7962">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7962">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7963">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7963">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7964">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7964">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7965">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7965">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7966">키워드가  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7966">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7967">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7967">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7968">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7968">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7969">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7969">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7970">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7970">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7976">네덜란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7976">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7977">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7977">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7978">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7978">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7979">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7979">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7980">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7980">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7981">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7981">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7982">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7982">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7983">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7984">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7984">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7985">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7986">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7986">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7987">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7988">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7988">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7989">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7990">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7990">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7991">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7991">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7992">키워드가  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7992">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7993">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7993">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-7994">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-7994">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8032">네덜란드 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8032">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8033">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8033">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8034">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8034">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8035">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8035">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8036">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8036">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8037">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8037">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8038">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8038">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8039">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8039">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8040">영문자 14자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8040">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8041">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8041">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8042">14자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8042">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8043">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8043">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8044">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8044">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8045">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8045">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8046">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8046">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8047">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8047">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8048">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8048">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8049">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8049">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8050">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8051">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8051">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8052">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8053">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8053">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8054">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8054">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8055">검색된 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8055">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8056">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8056">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8057">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8057">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8063">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8063">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8064">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8064">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8066">뉴질랜드 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8066">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8067">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8067">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8068">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8068">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8069">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8069">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8070">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8070">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8071">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8071">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8072">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8072">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8073">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8074">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14-16자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8074">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8075">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8076">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14-16자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8076">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8077">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8077">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8078">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8078">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8079">3-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8079">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8080">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8080">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8081">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8081">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8082">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8082">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8083">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8083">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8084">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8084">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8085">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8086">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8086">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8087">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8088">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8088">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8089">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8089">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8090">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8090">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8091">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8091">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8092">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8092">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8093">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8093">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8095">account number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8095">account number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8097">bank_acct_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8097">bank_acct_id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8098">bank_acct_branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8098">bank_acct_branch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8099">bank_acct_nbr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8099">bank_acct_nbr</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8100">뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8100">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8101">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8101">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8102">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8102">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8103">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8103">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8104">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8104">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8105">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8105">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8106">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8106">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8107">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8108">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8108">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8110">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8110">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8111">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8111">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8112">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8112">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8113">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8114">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8115">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8116">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8116">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8117">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8117">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8118">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8118">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8119">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8119">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8120">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8120">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8187">뉴질랜드 내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8187">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8188">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8188">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8189">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8189">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8190">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8190">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8191">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8191">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8192">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8192">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8193">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8193">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8194">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8194">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8195">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8195">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8196">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8197">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8197">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8198">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8198">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8199">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8199">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8200">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8200">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8201">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8201">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8202">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8202">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8203">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8204">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8204">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8205">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8206">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8206">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8207">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8207">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8208">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8208">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8209">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8210">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8210">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8211">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8211">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8212">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8212">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8213">ird no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8213">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8214">ird no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8214">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8215">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8215">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8216">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8216">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8217">ird number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8217">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8218">내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8218">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8219">뉴질랜드 보건부 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8219">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8220">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8220">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8221">3개의 문자, 공백(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8221">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8222">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8222">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8223">'I'와 'O'를 제외한 3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 림)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8223">three letters (not case sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8224">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8224">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8225">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8225">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8226">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8227">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8227">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8228">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8229">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8229">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8230">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8230">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8231">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8231">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8232">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8232">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8233">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8233">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8234">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8234">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8235">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8235">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8249">뉴질랜드 소셜 Wlefare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8249">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8250">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8250">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8251">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8251">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8252">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8252">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8253">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8253">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8254">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8254">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8255">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8255">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8256">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8257">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8257">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8258">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8259">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8259">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8260">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8260">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8261">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8261">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8262">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8263">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8263">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8264">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8264">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8265">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8265">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8266">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8266">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8267">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8267">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8268">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8268">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8269">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8269">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8270">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8270">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8271">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8271">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8272">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8272">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8280">노르웨이 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8280">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8281">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8282">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8282">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8283">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8284">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8284">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8285">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8285">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8286">3자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8286">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8287">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8287">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8288">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8288">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8289">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8289">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8290">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8290">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8291">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8291">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8292">이 Func_norway_id_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8292">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8293">검색된 Keyword_norway_id_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8293">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8294">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8294">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8295">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8295">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8296">이 Func_norway_id_numbe 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8296">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8297">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8297">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8306">필리핀 통합 다목적 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8306">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8307">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8307">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8308">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8308">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8309">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8309">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8310">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8310">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8311">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8311">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8312">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8312">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8313">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8313">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8314">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8314">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8315">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8315">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8316">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8316">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8317">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8317">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8318">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8318">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8319">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8319">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8320">정규식은 Regex_philippines_unified_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8320">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8321">검색된 Keyword_philippines_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8321">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8322">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8322">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8323">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8323">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8326">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8326">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8327">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8327">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8328">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8328">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8329">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8330">슬래시 2개가 포함된 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8330">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8331">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8332">14자리 숫자와 슬래시 2개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8332">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8333">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8333">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8334">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8334">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8335">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8335">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8336">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8336">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8337">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8337">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8338">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8338">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8339">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8339">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8340">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8340">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8341">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8342">`Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8342">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8343">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8343">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8467">폴란드 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8467">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8468">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8468">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8469">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8469">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8470">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8470">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8471">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8471">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8472">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8473">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8473">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8474">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8475">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8475">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8476">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8476">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8477">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8477">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8478">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8478">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8479">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8479">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8480">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8480">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8482">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8482">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8483">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8483">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8484">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8484">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8489">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8489">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8490">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8491">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8491">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8492">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8492">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8493">YYMMDD 형식의 생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8493">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8494">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8494">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8495">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8495">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8496">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8496">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8497">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8497">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8498">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8498">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8499">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8499">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8500">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8500">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8501">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8501">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8502">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8502">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8503">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8503">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8504">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8504">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8505">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8505">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8506">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8506">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8507">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8507">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8508">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8508">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8509">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8509">dowódosobisty</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8511">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8511">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8517">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8517">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8518">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8518">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8519">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8520">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8520">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8521">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8522">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8522">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8523">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8524">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8525">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8526">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8526">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8527">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8527">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8528">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8528">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8529">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8529">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8530">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8530">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8531">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8531">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8532">Numer paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8532">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8533">Nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8533">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8534">Paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8534">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8535">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8535">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8536">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8536">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8537">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8537">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8538">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8538">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8539">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8539">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8540">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8540">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8541">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8541">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8542">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8542">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8543">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8544">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8544">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8545">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8546">9자리 숫자 또는 14자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8546">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8547">9자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8547">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8548">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8548">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8549">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8549">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8550">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8550">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8551">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8552">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8553">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8554">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8554">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8555">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8555">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8556">검색된 Keywords_polish_regon_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8556">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8557">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8557">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8558">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8558">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8575">폴란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8575">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8576">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8576">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8577">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8577">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8578">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8578">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8579">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8579">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8580">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8580">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8581">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8581">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8582">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8583">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8583">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8584">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8584">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8585">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8585">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8586">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8586">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8587">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8587">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8588">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8588">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8589">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8589">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8590">이  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8590">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8591">키워드가  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8591">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8621">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8621">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8622">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8623">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8623">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8624">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8625">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8625">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8626">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8627">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8627">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8628">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8629">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8629">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8630">정규식은 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8630">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8631">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8631">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
