## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8651">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8651">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8652">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8653">두 개의 패턴 - 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8653">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8654">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8655">패턴 1: 문자 2자, 특수 문자가 있는 5/6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8655">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8656">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8656">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8657">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8657">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8658">5 또는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8658">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8659">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8659">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8660">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8660">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8661">패턴 2: 문자 1개와 특수 문자가 있는 6/8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8661">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8662">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8662">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8663">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8663">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8664">6 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8664">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8665">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8665">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8666">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8666">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8667">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8668">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8668">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8670">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8671">`Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8671">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8672">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8672">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8804">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8804">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8805">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8805">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8806">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8807">1개의 문자와 공백 또는 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8807">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8808">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8809">한 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8809">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8810">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8810">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8811">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8811">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8812">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8813">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8813">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8814">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8815">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8815">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8816">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8816">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8817">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8817">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8841">포르투갈 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8841">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8842">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8843">선택적 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8843">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8844">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8844">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8845">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8845">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8846">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8846">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8847">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8847">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8848">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8848">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8849">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8849">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8850">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8851">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8851">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8852">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8853">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8853">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8854">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8854">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8855">키워드가  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8855">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8856">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8856">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8857">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8857">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8882">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8882">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8883">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8883">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8884">한 문자와 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8884">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8885">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8885">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8886">한 문자와 8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8886">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8887">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8887">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8888">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8888">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8889">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8890">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8890">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8891">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8892">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8892">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8893">`Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8893">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-8894">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-8894">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9022">루마니아 CNP(개인 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9022">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9023">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9023">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9024">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9024">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9025">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9025">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9026">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9026">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9027">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9027">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9028">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9028">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9029">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9030">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9030">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9031">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9031">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9032">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9032">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9033">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9033">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9034">01-52 또는 99일 수 있는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9034">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9035">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9035">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9036">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9036">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9037">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9037">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9038">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9038">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9039">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9039">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9040">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9040">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9041">키워드가  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9041">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9042">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9042">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9043">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9043">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9094">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9094">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9095">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9095">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9096">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9096">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9097">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9097">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9098">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9098">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9099">8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9099">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9100">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9100">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9101">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9101">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9102">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9102">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9103">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9103">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9104">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9104">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9105">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9105">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9119">numuirul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9119">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9120">러시아 여권 번호 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9120">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9121">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9121">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9122">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9122">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9123">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9123">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9124">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9124">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9125">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9125">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9126">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9126">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9127">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9128">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9128">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9129">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9130">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9130">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9131">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9131">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9132">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9132">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9133">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9133">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9134">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9134">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9135">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9135">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9136">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9137">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9137">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9138">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9139">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9140">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9140">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9141">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9141">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9158">러시아 여권 번호 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9158">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9159">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9159">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9160">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9160">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9161">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9161">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9162">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9162">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9163">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9163">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9164">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9164">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9165">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9166">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9166">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9167">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9168">9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9168">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9169">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9169">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9170">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9170">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9171">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9171">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9172">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9173">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9173">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9176">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9176">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9177">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9177">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9194">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9194">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9195">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9195">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9196">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9196">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9197">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9197">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9198">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9198">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9199">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9199">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9200">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9200">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9201">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9201">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9202">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9203">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9203">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9204">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9204">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9205">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9205">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9206">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9206">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9207">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9207">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9208">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9208">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9209">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9209">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9210">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9210">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9211">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9211">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9212">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9213">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9213">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9214">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9214">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9215">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9215">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9216">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9216">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9217">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9217">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9218">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9218">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9219">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9220">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9220">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9221">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9222">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9222">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9223">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9223">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9224">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_singapore_nric 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9224">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9225">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9226">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9226">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9227">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9227">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9228">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9228">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9239">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9239">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9240">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9241">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9241">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9242">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9242">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9243">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9243">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9244">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9244">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9245">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9245">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9246">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9247">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9248">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9250">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9250">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9251">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9251">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9377">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9377">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9378">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9378">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9379">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9379">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9380">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9380">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9381">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9381">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9382">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9382">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9383">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9383">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9384">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9385">선택적 백사시를 포함하는 9자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9385">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9386">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9386">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9387">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9387">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9388">선택적 슬래시(/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9388">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9389">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9389">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9390">선택적 검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9390">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9391">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9392">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9392">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9393">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9394">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9394">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9395">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9395">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9396">키워드가  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9396">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9397">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9397">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9398">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9398">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9445">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9445">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9446">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9446">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9447">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9448">1자리 숫자 또는 문자, 공백이나 따로 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9448">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9450">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ),7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9450">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9451">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9452">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9453">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9454">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9454">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9455">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9455">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9456">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9456">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9475">스로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9475">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9476">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9476">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9477">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9477">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9478">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9478">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9479">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9479">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9480">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9481">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9481">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9482">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9483">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9483">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9484">`Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9484">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9485">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9485">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9612">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9612">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9613">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9613">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9614">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9614">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9615">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9615">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9616">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9616">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9617">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9617">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9618">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9618">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9619">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9619">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9620">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9620">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9621">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9621">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9622">지정된 패턴의 13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9622">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9623">생년월일(DDMMLLL)에 해당하는 7자리 숫자입니다. 여기서 "LLL"은 생년월일의 마지막 세 자리 숫자에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9623">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9624">생년월일 "50"에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9624">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9625">같은 날에 태어나는 사람의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당하는 3자리 숫자(남성 000-499, 여성의 경우 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9625">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9626">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9626">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9627">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9628">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9628">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9629">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9630">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9630">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9631">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9631">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9632">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9632">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9633">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9633">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9634">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9634">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9662">스로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9662">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9663">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9663">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9664">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9665">2개의 문자와 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9665">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9667">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9667">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9668">문자 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9668">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9669">대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9669">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9670">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9670">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9671">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9672">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9672">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9674">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9675">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9675">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9676">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9676">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9696">스로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9696">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9697">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9697">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9698">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9698">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9699">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9699">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9700">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9700">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9701">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9701">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9702">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9702">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9703">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9704">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9704">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9705">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9705">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9706">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9706">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9707">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9707">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9708">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9708">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9709">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9709">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9710">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9710">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9711">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9711">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9712">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9712">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9713">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9713">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9714">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9714">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9715">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9715">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9716">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9716">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9740">남아프리카 공화국 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9740">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9741">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9742">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9742">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9743">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9744">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9744">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9745">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9745">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9746">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9746">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9747">한 자리 숫자 시민권 표시기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9747">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9748">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9748">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9749">체크 아웃 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9749">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9750">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9751">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9751">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9752">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9753">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9754">이 Func_south_africa_identification_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9754">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9755">검색된 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9755">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9756">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9756">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9761">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9761">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9762">대한민국 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9762">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9763">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9764">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9764">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9765">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9766">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9766">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9767">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9767">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9768">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9768">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9769">세기 및 성별로 결정된 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9769">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9770">4자리 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9770">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9771">앞의 숫자가 동일한 사람들을 차별화하는 데 사용되는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9771">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9772">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9772">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9773">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9774">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9774">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9775">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9776">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9776">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9777">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9777">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9778">검색된 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9778">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9779">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9780">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9780">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9781">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9781">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9782">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9782">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9783">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9783">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9784">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9784">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9785">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9785">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9786">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9786">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9787">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9787">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9788">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9788">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9789">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9789">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9790">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9790">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9791">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9792">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9792">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9793">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9794">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9794">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9795">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9795">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9796">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9796">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9797">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9798">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9798">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9799">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9800">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9801">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9801">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9802">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9802">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9804">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9804">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9938">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9938">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9939">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9939">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9940">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9940">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9941">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9941">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9942">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9942">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9943">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9943">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9944">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9944">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9945">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9946">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9946">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9947">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9948">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9948">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9949">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9949">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9950">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9950">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9951">검사 문자 1개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9951">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9952">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9952">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9953">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9953">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9954">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9954">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9955">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9955">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9956">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9956">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9957">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9957">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9958">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9958">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9959">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9959">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
