## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9983">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9983">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9984">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9984">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9985">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9985">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9986">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 문자와 숫자의 8 또는 9자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9986">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9987">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9987">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9988">8-9자 또는 9자 조합의 문자와 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9988">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9989">2자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9989">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9990">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9990">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9991">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9991">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9992">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9992">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9993">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9993">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9994">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9994">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9995">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9995">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9996">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9996">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-9997">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-9997">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10023">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10023">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10024">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10024">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10025">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10026">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10026">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10027">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10027">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10028">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10028">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10029">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10029">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10030">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10030">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10031">7~8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10031">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10032">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10032">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10033">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10033">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10034">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10035">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10035">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10036">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10037">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10037">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10038">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10038">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10039">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10039">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10040">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10040">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10041">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10041">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10042">스페인 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10042">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10043">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10043">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10044">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10044">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10045">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10045">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10046">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10046">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10047">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10047">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10048">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10048">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10049">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10050">지정된 패턴의 7-8자리 숫자와 1~2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10050">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10051">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10051">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10052">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10052">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10053">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10053">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10054">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10054">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10055">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10055">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10056">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10056">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10057">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10057">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10058">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10058">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10059">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10059">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10060">대문자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10060">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10061">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10061">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10062">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10062">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10063">내국인 식별 번호가 있는 외신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10063">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10064">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10064">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10065">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10065">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10066">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10066">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10067">외신의 ID 번호가 없는 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10067">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10068">"M"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10068">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10069">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10069">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10070">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10070">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10071">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10072">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10072">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10073">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10074">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10074">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10075">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10075">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10076">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10076">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10077">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10077">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10078">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치하는 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10078">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10109">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10109">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10110">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10110">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10111">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10111">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10112">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10112">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10113">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10113">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10114">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10114">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10115">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" 여기서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10115">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10116">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10116">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10117">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미클론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10117">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10118">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 따오기 표시(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10118">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10119">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10119">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10120">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10120">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10121">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10121">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10122">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10122">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10123">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10123">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10124">정규식은 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10124">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10125">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 **수** 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10125">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10126">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder **패턴과** 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10126">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10127">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10127">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10128">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10128">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10129">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10129">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10130">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10130">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10131">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10131">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10132">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10132">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10133">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10133">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10134">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10134">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10135">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10135">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10136">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) --OR--</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10136">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10137">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10137">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10138">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10138">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10139">기호보다 작음(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10139">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10140">대/소문자, 자릿수, 상용구(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자에 1-200자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10140">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10141">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10141">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10142">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10142">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10143">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10143">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10144">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10144">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10148">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10148">onebox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10153">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10153">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10154">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10154">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10155">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10155">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10156">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10157">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10157">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10158">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10159">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10159">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10160">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10160">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10161">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10161">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10162">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10162">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10163">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10164">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10164">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10165">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10166">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10166">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10167">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10167">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10168">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10168">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10169">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10169">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10177">driver lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10177">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10178">driver lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10178">driver lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10179">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10179">driver license</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10301">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10301">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10302">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10303">10 또는 12자리 숫자 및 선택적 분수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10303">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10304">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10305">10자리 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 디지타이터:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10305">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10306">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10306">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10307">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10307">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10308">delimiter of "-" or "+"(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10308">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10309">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10309">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10310">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10311">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10311">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10312">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10313">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10313">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10314">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10314">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10315">키워드가 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10315">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10316">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10316">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10317">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10317">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10318">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10318">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10319">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10319">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10338">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10338">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10339">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10339">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10340">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10341">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10341">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10342">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10343">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10343">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10344">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10344">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10345">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10345">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10346">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10346">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10347">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10347">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10348">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10348">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10349">다음 중 하나는 true입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10349">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10350">검색된 Keyword_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10350">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10351">검색된 Keyword_sweden_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10351">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10382">스웨덴 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10382">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10383">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10383">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10384">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10385">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10385">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10386">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10386">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10387">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10387">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10388">생년월일에 해당하는 8자리 숫자(YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10388">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10389">일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자는 여기서:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10389">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10390">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성의 홀수 할당에 의해 성별을 나타내고 여성은 등수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10390">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10391">1990년 1월 1일 세금 기록에 따라 일련 번호 할당은 이민자에 대한 특별 코드(일반적으로 9자리)를 사용하여 출산한 지역(1947년 1월 1일 이전의 생년도)에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10391">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10392">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10392">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10393">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10393">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10394">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10394">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10395">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10395">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10396">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10396">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10397">이  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10397">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10398">키워드가  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10398">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10399">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10399">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10400">이  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10400">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10401">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10401">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10402">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10402">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10407">identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10407">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10408">personal identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10408">personal identification no</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10416">스웨덴 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10416">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10417">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10417">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10418">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10418">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10419">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10419">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10420">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10420">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10421">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10421">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10422">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10422">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10423">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10424">10자리 숫자 및 지정된 패턴의 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10424">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10425">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10426">10자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10426">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10427">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10427">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10428">더하기 기호 또는 minus 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10428">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10429">ID 번호를 고유하게 만드는 3자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10429">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10430">1990년 전에 발급된 숫자의 경우 7번째와 8번째 숫자는 생년월일 또는 외세의 신생아를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10430">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10431">9번째 위치의 숫자는 성별을 남성의 홀수 또는 심지어 여성으로 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10431">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10432">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10432">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10433">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10434">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10434">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10435">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10436">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10436">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10437">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10437">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10438">키워드가  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10438">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10439">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10439">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10440">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10440">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10466">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10466">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10467">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10468">4개의 문자와 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10468">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10469">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10470">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10470">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10471">4문자 은행 코드(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10471">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10472">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10472">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10473">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10473">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10474">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10475">1~3자리 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10475">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10476">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10477">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10477">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10478">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10479">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10479">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10480">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10480">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10481">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10481">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10517">銀行コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10517">銀行コード</span></span>

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10518">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10518">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10519">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10519">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10520">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10520">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10521">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10521">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10522">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10522">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10523">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10523">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10524">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10524">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10525">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10526">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10526">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10527">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10528">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10528">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10529">3자리 숫자 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10529">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10530">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10530">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10531">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10531">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10532">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10532">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10533">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10533">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10534">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10534">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10535">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10535">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10536">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10537">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10537">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10538">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10539">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10539">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10540">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10540">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10541">검색된 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10541">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10542">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10543">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10543">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10550">personalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10550">personalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10551">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10551">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10552">개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10552">personal id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10554">insuranceno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10554">insuranceno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10555">uniqueidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10555">uniqueidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10556">unique identification no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10556">unique identification no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10557">avs number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10557">avs number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10558">personal identity no versicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10558">personal identity no versicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10559">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10559">identifikationsnummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10561">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10561">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
