- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10563">numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10563">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10564">대만 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10564">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10565">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10566">한 문자(영어) 및 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10566">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10567">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10568">한 문자(영어)와 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10568">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10569">한 문자(영어로, 대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10569">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10570">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10570">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10571">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10571">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10572">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10572">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10573">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10573">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10574">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10574">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10575">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10575">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10576">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10576">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10577">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10577">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10578">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10578">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10579">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10579">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10580">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10580">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10581">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10581">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10582">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10582">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10583">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10583">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10584">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10584">身份證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10585">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10585">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10586">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10586">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10587">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10587">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10588">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10588">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10589">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10589">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10590">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10590">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10591">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10591">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10592">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10592">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10593">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10593">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10594">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10594">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10595">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10595">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10596">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10596">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10597">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10597">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10598">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10598">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10599">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10599">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10600">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10600">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10601">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10601">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10602">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10602">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10603">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10603">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10604">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10604">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10605">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10605">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10606">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10606">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10607">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10607">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10608">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10608">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10609">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10609">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10610">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10610">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10611">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10611">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10612">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_passport 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10612">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10613">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10613">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10614">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10614">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10615">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10615">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10616">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10616">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10617">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10617">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10618">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10618">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10619">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10619">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10620">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10620">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10621">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10621">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10622">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10622">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10623">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10623">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10624">대만 거주자 인증서(ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10624">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10625">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10626">10개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10626">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10627">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10628">10개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10628">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10629">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10629">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10630">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10630">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10631">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10631">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10632">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10632">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10633">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10633">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10634">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10634">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10635">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10635">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10636">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10636">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10637">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10637">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10638">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10638">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10639">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10639">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10640">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10640">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10641">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10641">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10642">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10642">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10643">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10643">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10644">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10644">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10645">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10645">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10646">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10646">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10647">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10647">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10648">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10648">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10649">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10649">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10650">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10650">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10651">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10652">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10652">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10653">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10654">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10654">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10655">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아닌 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10655">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10656">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10656">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10657">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10658">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10658">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10659">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10660">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10660">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10661">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10661">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10662">검색된 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10662">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10663">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10663">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10664">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10664">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10665">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10665">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10666">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10666">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10667">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10667">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10668">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10668">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10669">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10669">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10670">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10670">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10671">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10671">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10672">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10672">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10673">터키어 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10673">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10674">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10675">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10675">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10676">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10677">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10677">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10678">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10678">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10679">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10679">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10680">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10680">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10681">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10681">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10682">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10682">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10683">검색된 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10683">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10684">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10684">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10685">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10685">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10686">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10686">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10687">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10687">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10688">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10688">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10689">TC Kimlik numarasas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10689">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10690">바타르다슈타크 numarasanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10690">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10691">Vatandaandaandalandak no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10691">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10692">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10692">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10693">driver's license number(운전 면허 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10693">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10694">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10694">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10695">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10696">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10696">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10698">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10698">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10699">5자리 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10699">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10700">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10700">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10701">생년월일 형식 MMDDY의 5자리 숫자(드라이버가 여성인 경우 7번째 문자는 50으로 증가합니다. 예를 들어 01에서 12까지는 51에서 62까지 증가)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10701">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10702">대소문자 구분 안 2개 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10702">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10703">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10703">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10704">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10705">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10705">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10706">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10707">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10707">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10708">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10708">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10709">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10709">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10710">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10710">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10711">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10711">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10728">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10728">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10729">electoral roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10729">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10730">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10731">2개의 문자와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10731">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10732">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10733">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 1-4개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10733">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10734">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10735">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10735">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10736">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10737">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10737">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10738">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10738">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10739">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10739">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10740">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10740">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10741">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10741">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10742">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10742">council nomination</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10744">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10744">electoral register</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10746">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10746">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10747">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10747">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10748">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10749">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10749">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10750">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10750">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10751">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10751">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10752">3자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10752">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10753">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10753">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10754">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10754">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10755">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10755">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10756">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10756">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10757">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10758">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10758">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10759">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10760">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10760">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10761">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10761">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10762">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10762">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10763">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10763">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10764">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10764">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10765">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10765">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10766">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10766">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10784">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10784">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10785">NINO(national insurance number)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10785">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10786">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 IDentificaiton 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10786">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10787">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10788">공백 또는 대시로 구분된 7자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10788">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10789">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10789">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10790">가능한 두 가지 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10790">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10791">두 글자(유효한 NOS는 이 연결의 유효성을 검사하는 특정 문자만 사용하고 대소문자는 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10791">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10792">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10792">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10793">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D'(접두사와 같이 접미사에는 특정 문자만 사용할 수 있습니다. 대소문자 구분 안 되거나)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10793">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10794">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10794">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10795">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10795">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10796">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10796">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10797">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10797">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10798">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10798">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10799">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10799">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10800">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10800">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10801">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10801">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10802">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10802">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10803">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10803">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10804">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10805">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10806">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10807">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10808">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10808">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10809">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10809">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10810">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10810">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10811">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10811">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10812">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10812">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10833">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10833">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10834">고유 납세자 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10834">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10835">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10836">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10837">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10838">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10839">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10840">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10841">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10842">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10842">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10843">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10844">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10844">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10845">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10846">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10846">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10847">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10848">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10848">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10849">이  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10849">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10850">키워드가  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10850">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10863">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10863">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10870">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10870">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10871">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10871">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10872">6-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10872">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10873">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10873">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10874">6-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10874">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10875">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10875">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10876">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10876">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10877">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10877">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10878">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10878">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10879">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10879">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10880">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10880">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10910">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10910">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10911">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10912">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10912">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10913">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10914">주에 따라 다를 수 있습니다. 예를 들어 뉴욕은 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10914">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10915">ddd ddd d와 같은 9자리 숫자가 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10915">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10916">dddd와 같은 9자리 숫자는 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10916">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10917">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10918">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10919">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10920">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10920">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10921">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10921">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10922">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10922">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10923">검색된 Keyword_us_drivers_license 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10923">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10924">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10924">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10925">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10925">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10926">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10926">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10927">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10927">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-10928">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-10928">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11026">미국 ITIN(개인 납세자 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11026">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11027">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11027">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11028">"9"로 시작하고 "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함하는 9자리 숫자(선택적으로 공백 또는 대시로 서식 지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11028">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11029">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11029">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11030">형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11030">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11031">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11031">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11032">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11032">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11033">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11033">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11034">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11034">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11035">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11035">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11036">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11036">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11037">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11037">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11038">폼이 없는 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11038">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11039">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11039">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11040">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11040">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11041">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11041">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11042">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11042">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11043">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11043">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11044">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11044">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11045">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11045">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11046">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11046">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11047">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11047">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11048">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11048">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11049">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11049">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11050">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11050">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11051">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11051">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11052">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11052">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11053">이 Func_formatted_itin Func_unformatted_itin 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11053">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11068">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11068">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11069">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11069">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11070">서식 있는 패턴 또는 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11070">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11071">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강합니다. 여기서 숫자의 특정 부분이 유효한 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11071">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11072">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11072">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11073">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 봐야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11073">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11074">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-d OR d d)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11074">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11075">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자(ddd)로 서식이 지정되지 않은 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11075">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11076">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-d OR ddd d)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11076">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11077">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로 포스터가 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11077">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11078">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11079">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11079">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11080">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11081">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11081">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11082">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11082">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11083">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11083">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11084">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11085">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11085">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11086">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11086">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11087">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11087">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11088">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11088">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11089">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11089">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11090">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11090">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11091">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11091">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11092">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11092">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11093">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11093">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11107">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11107">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11108">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11108">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11109">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11109">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11110">passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11110">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11111">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11112">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11112">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11113">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11114">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11114">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11115">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11116">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11116">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11117">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11118">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11118">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11119">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11119">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11120">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11120">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11121">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11121">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11122">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11122">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11123">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11123">Passport Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11124">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11124">Passport No</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11125">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11125">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11126">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11126">Passport#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11127">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11127">PassportID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11128">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11128">Passportno</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11129">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11129">passportnumber</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11130">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11130">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11131">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11131">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11132">೺೺臲೺</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11132">パスポートのNum</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11141">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11141">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11142">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11142">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11143">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11143">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11144">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11144">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11145">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11145">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11146">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11146">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11147">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11147">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11148">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11148">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11149">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11149">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11150">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11150">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11151">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11151">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11152">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11152">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11153">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11153">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11154">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11154">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11155">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11155">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11156">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11156">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11157">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11157">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11158">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11158">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11160">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11160">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11161">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11161">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11163">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11163">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11164">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11164">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11165">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11165">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11166">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11166">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11167">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11167">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11168">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11168">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11169">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11169">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11170">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11170">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11171">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11171">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11172">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11172">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11173">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11174">8자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11174">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11175">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11176">8자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11176">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11177">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11177">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11178">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11178">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11179">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11180">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11180">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11181">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11182">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11182">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11183">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11183">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1fa48-11184">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1fa48-11184">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
